en: The enemies will do less damage to you, also prices will be more easy afordable in shop. Fits for unexperienced players or for those who just want click and have fun (to do just pew-pew with some fireballs)
Classic way to play the game. I tried my best to do balance on this mode, which will allow players  to have fun and in same time not so easy to finish game.
More damage taken from enemies, but more drop from them. Fun to try after comliting normal difficulty
Please select game difficulty for your character
Spark is esential skill of every wizard. Be like Zeus throw yout sparks on your enemies!
lt: Kibirkštis yra pagrindinis kiekvieno mago ?g?dis. B?kite kaip Zeusas, meskite kibirkštis ? savo priešus!

en: Snowball is not a joke, it's powerfull weapon if you know how to use it. It does damage in area and can slow down your enemies. Ymir is helping you to slow down your enemies.
Fireball. What you expect - it's does damge in area and takes enemies in fire. Agni is proud of you!

Fireblade trap - technical and magical in same time. Good to fight against lot of ground enemies. Will turn them at fire. But be carefull and drop it wisely as it could be useless in unexperienced hands.
Toxic meteor is  one of the rare meteors which wasn't touch the Earth surface.Powerfull weapon,  after it will contact surface - it's unstably will emit acid gas which damage your enemies.
Stones are usefull for building or throwing it. Please try not to throw all of them they are more usefull for small buildings.
lt: Akmenys naudingi statant ar m?tant. Stenkit?s neišmesti j? vis?, jie yra naudingesni mažiems pastatams.

en: Crystals are not very stable and are fuel for powerfull ancient weapons. Try to put in on fireplace or just to throw it. Lets see what will happened.

en: Allows player to zoom in enemies and other objects. Uses stamina as main resourse. Good to see you enemies from big distances.

en: You can dash through your enemies to avoid damage or move faster. It's a best way to clean up dangeons and stay safe.
This tablet can give you extra power on your skills! But of couse temporary, use it and go find some enemies...
